snippet: Shares in struggling Italian bank Unicredit continued to slide Monday after the bank's 7.5 billion euro, or $9.6 billion, offering met with little interest from investors.
abstract: Shares in struggling Italian bank Unicredit continued to slide Monday after the bank's 7.5 billion euro, or $9.6 billion, offering met with little interest from investors.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Shares of the struggling Italian bank UniCredit continued to slide on Monday after an offering of new stock met with little interest from investors.
